text: 30|54|allāh uṅkaḷai (ārampattil) palavīṉamāṉa nilaimaiyil uṟpatti ceykiṟāṉ. Antap palavīṉattiṟkup piṉṉar avaṉē (vālipa) palattaiyum koṭukkiṟāṉ. Anta palattiṟkup piṉṉar vayōtikattaiyum, palavīṉattaiyum koṭukkiṟāṉ. (Ivvāṟellām) avaṉ, tāṉ virumpiyavāṟu (uṅkaḷai) ākkukiṟāṉ. Avaṉ (aṉaittaiyum) naṉkaṟintavaṉum mikka āṟṟaluṭaiyavaṉum avāṉ
